resources.string: Come and participate the Events. Win more prizes if your Videos have been chosen as Highlights
If this is the first time you\'re using Goluk, make sure Wi-Fi is enabled on your phone, and set up a Wi-Fi connection
Confirm that the Wi-Fi indicator light is flashing
Click button then go to settings to connect
Your Goluk has connected to phone successfully
In normal use, the phone client will automatically create a Wi-Fi hotspot to connect to Goluk. You can enjoy Video comment, Highlight share, webcast and other experiences through the phone client
Waiting for Goluk to connect to your phone
Reset your Goluk Wi-Fi hotspot password
Unable to pair. Please connect again
Please turn off Goluk for 5 to 10 seconds, then restart it. Press the OK button and wait for Goluk to connect to your device
Unable to pair Goluk. Please connect again
Wait a moment, live will start instantly
Automatic synchronizing the five last recorded Highligt and Emergency Video, after device connects and synchronizes successfully with Goluk
Password can be changed when the device is successfully connected to Goluk
The password must be 8–15 characters. New password will take effect after 30 seconds.
Before installing the Firmware upgrade, make sure the camera is connected properly. Please do not power off until the upgrade is complete.
Firmware upgrade is in process, please do not disconnect the power
Before installing the new Firmware, make sure the memory card has been inserted into the device
Your Goluk Firmware version is up to date
Please wait for the voice prompt after upgrade is complete
You have received multiple verification codes, please make sure your phone number is correct and the device has good receiving signal
Unable to obstain verification code. This phone number has reached the maximum trials to obtain a verification code
Unable to obtain verification code. This phone number has reached the maximum attempts to obtain a verification code (4 times per day)
This phone number has not yet been registered
This phone number is already registered
Unable to get a verification code
Verification code has been sent successfully. Please check
This phone number has sent 4 verification codes within 1h
Unable to send verification code. Please request a verification code again
Timeout for entering the verification code / verification code does not exist
Beijing Mobnote Technology Co., Ltd All rights reserved
Unable to initiate request. Please wait 60 seconds
Confirm to unpair the device? (You will no longer be able to configure the device information before connecting again)

Firmware upgrade require your phone to connect with the camera. After a successful connection, go to My Device> Camera Administration> Goluk Firmware Upgrade .Follow the instructions to upgrade the Firmware
This Video has won the event award
This Video has won the system award
This Video has been selected for Recommendation
You have commented too frequently. Please take a break before next comment

Vehicle status detection: When the vehicle is moving, Goluk will operate based on the loop recording mode setting; when the vehicle is parked, Goluk will take 1 photo every second and enable vibration (8 seconds of video both before and after the trigger) as well as motion (8 seconds of video both before and after the trigger) sensors.
The network is not working. Please check the network and try again
Phone number format error. Please re-enter
Password format is incorrect. Please enter 6-16 digits / alphabets. Case sensitive
You have entered the wrong password 5 times and reached the incorrect log-in limit. This account will be locked for 2 hours. Please reset your password and try again
Please be assured that we will not use your mobile phone number for other purposes
Unable to send feedback. Please try again later
Thank you for your feedback. We are looking into it now
You are being logged in. Please wait
Vehicle current status will be automatically detected after open Parking Protection function; When the vehicle is in parking status, Goluk will take 1 picture each second

Vehicle detection functions will be activated when open Parking Protection, one is vibration detection(trigger pre 8 seconds + post 8 seconds), the other is movement detection(trigger pre 8 seconds + post 8 seconds)
You can only choose to share to public once you enter the Event
Event is online \n Wait for your upload
No recommended excellent videos yet \n Wait for your upload
Network error. Please check your connection
Data error, please try again later
Video is being downloaded. It can not be deleted

When the vehicle is in travelling state, Goluk will operate in accordance with the Automatic Loop Recording mode; by automatically determining the vehicle\'s current status. When the vehicle is parked, Goluk will capture every photo shoot for every second; and initiate Vibration Detection mode (8 seconds Video before and 8 seconds Video after trigger) and Motion Detection mode (8 seconds Video before and 8 seconds Video after trigger)

Vehicle status detection: When the vehicle is moving, Goluk will operate based on the loop recording mode setting; when the vehicle is parked, Goluk will take 1 photo every second and enable vibration (8 seconds of video both before and after the trigger) as well as motion (8 seconds of video both before and after the trigger) sensors.

Once this is activated, when it is detected that the car has been stationary for more than 20 minutes (without starting security mode), then the dashcam will enter sleep mode (no videos will be recorded in this mode). If the cigarette lighter adapter has power even when the vehicle engine is off, then we strongly suggest that you activate this function.

Once the function is activated, it will automatically go into the Parking Sleep Mode with ultra low power consumption; after detecting the vehicle is stationary for more than 10 minutes, in order to protect your battery from power loss . If your vehicle engine is off at the parking, the cigarette lighter adaptor still can supply electricity normally. It is strongly recommended that you turn on this function.
Check that the camera is properly connected
Refer to image below. Move the cross shown above to the middle of the end of the road.
Goluk Smart GO Driver Assistance System can send advanced Following Distance Safety Warnings
Please drive in the middle of a lane with fewer vehicles.
After parking, complete the first-time user settings following the configuration guide.
You have not configured Following Distance Safety Warning. Configure now? (Y/N)
In order to provide accurate infosrmation to assist you drive safely, please enter the correct location parameters.
Which device would you like to connect？
Sorry, unable to download new Goluk Firmwar. Please check your network connection and try again
Upgrade has started. This process may take a few minutes. \nPlease do not turn off the camera power. …..\nUpgrade Stage 1 :
Upgrade has started. This process may take a few minutes. \nPlease do not turn off the camera power. …..\nUpgrade Stage 2 :
File transfer is successful. Preparing for upgrade
Sorry, unable to upgrade. Please try again.
Dashcam is disconnected. Please check and try again later
Sorry, the upgrade is not successful. Please do not turn off the camera power, wait for the camera to restart and try again
Sorry, the camera was disconnected due to an error but it is still upgrading. Please wait for the upgrade to finish and do not switch off the camera
Installation files are being transferred to Goluk
The current version is up to date
New Goluk Firmware version is available
, Please download the latest APP for smooth Firmware upgrade.
Network connection timed out. Please check and try again
Current device client version does not match with Goluk Firmware version. Please try again after upgrade. Checking latest updates now
You are not connected to any device yet.
Downloading new Goluk Firmware upgrade file
Confirm to delete this device information (Y/N)
Have you placed the cross at the position as shown in the image?
Gentle reminder : \n Please use branded memory card with Class 10 and above specifications. Memory card qualities will lead to abnormal recording
Each video type has its own allocated storage space. When there is insufficient storage space, new videos will automatically overwrite the video files recorded earlier
Temporary files from Goluk\'s normal operation process
Erase all content in SD card
Failed to format the SD card
Are you sure to format the SD card？
Formatting the SD card. It may take 1 to 2 minutes, please wait
Please login and check for messages
Your real name has been verified. Come check it out now!
Your withdrawal request was not approved. Tap to see why
Your withdrawal request has been paid. Please check the deposit within 24 hours.
Your withdrawal was not approved. Tap to see why
Your withdrawal has been approved. Payout will be completed in 7 working days
Your video is being voted on right now. Go check it out
Congratulations! Your video has been featured. Go check it out
Network unavailable. Tap the screen and try again
Network anomalies. Please try again later
Confirm to dial this phone number (Y/N)
Please enter your personalized signature (50 characters or less)
Unable to connect to IPC hotspots
Press again to exit the APP
The current Firmware does not support this setting. Please try again after Firmware upgrade
Buy Goluk pressure sensor cable now
Videos are being transferred from Goluk
Unable to save Avatar. Please try again
Please enter a valid nickname (less than 10 characters)
Unable to edit data. Nickname field can not be empty
Network anomalies. Live Video has ended
The live broadcast has ended. See you!
You are currently on Live Video. Exit Live Video (Y/N)
Unable to create Live Video. Please try again
Unable to get my location info
The user has ended the Live Video. Thanks for watching
Reported, we will handle it as soon as possible
Please enter your reasons for the recommendation
You have not installed QQ or QQ version is too low
Uploading Video. Do you want to stop it (Y/N)
Video filter functions will be available soon. Stay tuned
Failed to get link to share
Goluk personal page sharing ( Shooted by #Goluk# )
Abnormal request. Please check whether the network is normal
Deleting a video will also delete its likes and comments. Delete? (Y/N)
Loading data. Please wait and try again
Network connection timed out. Please check the network
Created Wi-Fi AP, has client joined in
Wi-Fi connection failed, please try again

一键预览 轻松完成碰瓷取证\n随时抢拍 做不文明驾驶陋习的曝光台
这些沿途的风光 奇异的境遇 珍贵的瞬间\n多么渴望与人分享
透过散落在世界的极路客\n去发现路上那些叹为观止的美
24小时全天候车辆监控\n极路客做你爱车的守卫星
